org.anchoranalysis.plugin.opencv.bean.stack

Class OpenCVWriter

  • Object
    • AnchorBean<StackWriter>
      • StackWriter
        • OneOrThreeChannelsWriter
          • OpenCVWriter

  • public class OpenCVWriter
extends OneOrThreeChannelsWriter
    Writes a stack to the file-system using OpenCV and a specified extension.

    Note that as initialization of OpenCV can take many seconds, this writer is not recommended as a default writer for anchor's command-line usage, which may wish to very quickly execute jobs.

    Author:
    Owen Feehan
